[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@loopback/repository](./repository.md) &gt; [SchemaMigrationOptions](./repository.schemamigrationoptions.md) &gt; [models](./repository.schemamigrationoptions.models.md)

## SchemaMigrationOptions.models property

List of model names to migrate.

By default, all models are migrated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
models?: string[];
```
